title: Question 88:
description: How many SNX do I need to buy to fix my collateralization ratio?

fields.title: Answer
fields.value:
Go to [Mintr](https://mintr.synthetix.io/), click Burn, find the sUSD value under "Fix your Collateralization Ratio".

Multiply that sUSD value by **6** and the resulting number is the dollar value of the SNX you need to buy to fix your collateralization ratio.
